reviewText: If you like Bossa Nova and you don't like this DVD then, quite simply, you don't like Bossa Nova. This is the best "doc" I've seen so far on the subject and the music and stories are GOOD. Love it. Contains little facts and tid-bits about this great music form that are not well known. On a scale of one to 10 I give it an 11! Dig it, love it, learn from it, Bossa Nova fans it's waiting for you....

Im a old bossanova fan and i have seeked this types of films for years. Films with pictures and interviews of the old heroes and places. It is ALL in here. From unique filmsegments of american TV to fresh interviews with the old artists. I recomend this from all my heart
This totally entertaining video shows the early bossa nova pioneers getting together, and developing the bossa nova sound in Rio.  A must-watch for any lover of bossa nova music.  Highly recommended.
